attributes.action: rename the Thames to the Ning Nang Nong in honour of the late Spike Milligan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although the cows by the side of this river don't currently go bong, with a bit of work they could. All bodies currently named after the Thames would be renamed too so, the Thames Valley Police would become the Ning Nang Nong Valley Police.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
